videos.headline: Charlotte's LeMay gets the corner and dives in for TD
videos.description: Benny LeMay finds space and dives in for the 16-yard TD.

videos.headline: Middle Tennessee's Thomas barrels in for 2-yard TD
videos.description: Taveres Thomas plunges his way in for 2-yard touchdown run.

videos.headline: Middle Tennessee's Stockstill finds Windham for 47 yards
videos.description: Brent Stockstill connects with CJ Windham for 47 yards.

videos.headline: Middle Tennessee's Stockstill connects with Lee for deep TD
videos.description: Brent Stockstill finds  Ty Lee who takes it the distance for a 63-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Middle Tennessee's Stockstill finds Smith  for third TD of the game
videos.description: Brent Stockstill throws his third touchdown pass of the game to Patrick Smith to extend the Blue Raiders' lead to 35-14.
